Text:
This torrent came fast and seemed to be very complete, but unfortunately I couldn't get it to work. After installing it and cracking it, no matter what kind of compatibility I chose (and even if I chose none), the game wouldn't start. It would just crash and an error would appear, stating that the program has found an error and had to be shut down.

I'm using Win 7, I wonder if someone got this to work on their computer? 

Cheers xx

And problem solved! If anyone experiences the same problem I had just be sure to follow this guide, it solved the DEP issue for me! 
http://www.itechtalk.com/thread3591.html

And thanks for a great upload!
